1812,57|1795,63|1775,67|1774,67|1742,96|1739,143|1716,145|1735,147|1875,147|1895,149|1987,149|1965,107|1967,65|1935,65|1915,63|1895,67|1875,65|1855,61|1835,59|1825,58|1812,57 305-01|p.|305.
